thread.title: Beautiful and romantic stay in Paris
thread.title_full: Beautiful and romantic stay in Paris - Review of Hotel Romance Malesherbes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Iranyito90
title: Beautiful and romantic stay in Paris
text: Breakfast was amazing very yummy bread and fresh orange juice. We enjoyed the polite and nice staff that helped us around and all in all the stay was perfect! It was easy to get around you can either walk everywhere (4 days 140km) or take the metro or bus which is nearby!
